meanings.definition: a group of people or things that are unchanging or consistent in nature

meanings.sent1: Her constantans savings allowed her to buy a new bike.
meanings.sent2: The temperature remained constantans throughout the day.

meanings.definition: to maintain a steady or unchanging state or condition
meanings.sent1: She always tries to constantans her calm during stressful situations.
